TopicTitle: My First Minmus Landing EVER How Did I Do ;)

Articles.Content:
So for my first attempt at ever landing on minmus i try to land a huge ass base enjoy oh and i dont land well

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pMjDW7rAwko
Those poor kerbals D: Next time land and the frozen lakes

I like how the guys are out frolicking while the wreckage is still cartwheeling across the landscape.

And that your movie starts the same way Serenity does: what fell off the ship just as the recording began?
Loved the way your craft lost one little piece at a time, and it REALLY looked like you were gonna make it too at some point !... As Prodigy said, the frozen lakes are a good idea on Minmus.

It was a decoupler with a orbital construction jump drive thingy on it i recorded my self going to minmus legitly and it crashed at the end and i didnt have time to redo so i just cheated my way there and landed :'(

It helps to have less horizontal velocity than vertical.

How do you plan to get back now?
I have no freaking clue, well i said it was going to be a base its going to have to be a permanent base :S
